contents:
Agentic AI: Believe the Hype
Bain’s Chuck Whitten explains why agentic AI will transform not only corporate operations but many aspects of daily living.
By Chuck Whitten
  * February 01, 2025


  *   *   * 

Video 
#####

Agentic AI: Believe the Hype

en
Chuck Whitten, Bain’s Global Head of Digital, encourages company leaders to look past the marketing buzz around agentic AI and take action now. He also offers thoughts on the ROI of AI. 
  * View Part I of his talk here.[428]


#####
